content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Data & Analytics Competency Matrix \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As we covered in the \\\"Data & Analytics Intro\\\" module, the whole practice is organized in the structure of  data disciplines. There are ten disciplines, covering a large variety of our engineering and consulting capabilities and expertise. The approach to defining them is based on market prediction. The current discipline matrix reflects future opportunities and helps to move forward in prospective directions.
